c74object.name: the.jit.attr.wrapper
c74object.digest: Automatically direct and filter messages to specific jitter objects (in an abstraction)
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2021, www.xenorama.com.
Route all relevant messages/attributes to specific jitter objects in an abstraction. This enables automatic routing and filtering ensuring maximum functionality.

objarg.name: jitter-object-name
objarg.description: Target jitter object to which relevant messages are filtered. A jitter object of the same name should be connected to leftmost outlet and will receive only messages applicable to it.

attribute.name: pass
attribute.digest: Pass on all specific messages through rightmost outlet
attribute.description: Pass on all specific messages through rightmost outlet too. The default is 1 (pass specific messages to target object and through rightmost outlet as well). When set to '0', all object-specific messages will be filtered and not passed on through rightmost outlet.

attribute.name: custom
attribute.digest: Specify custom code params to be supported
attribute.description: Specify custom code params to be supported for target jit.gl.pix, jit.pix, jit.gen, jit.gl.slab or jit.gl.shader objects. All custom shader params listed as symbol arguments for this attribute will be automatically routed to the respective object. In the case of jit.gl.slab or jit.gl.shader 'param' is prepended, this way no extra attribute routing needs to be performed thereafter, and the word 'param' is likewise idle.
